All PEOPLE of Noida
;
;Mostly People living in flats are not maintaining their water tanks properly this results in lot of water wastage due to overflowing . they are not concerned because Monthly water charges are fixed. This is happening in all over Noida.
;
;The ballcock is not working & tanks are not covered , this results in silan in all houses & rise of malaria & dengue in noida.
;
;In Delhi MCD takes water charges on consumption basis & there is inspection by MCD team every year to check whether water tanks are properly covered or not, whether water coolers are proper cleaned or not.
;
;We require support of all Noida residents in this regard.
